sources.title: Girls Nite Out (1982)
sources.description: The students of DeWitt University are preparing themselves for a night of fun and frolics in the form of an all-night scavenger hunt. Little do they know that they are in fact the ones being hunted. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/girls-nite-out-1982/

metadata.Plot: The day after a huge party a scavenger hunt is held. Every college-age kid in town is out for the grand prize. One-by-one they are all dispatched by a killer in a giant bear suit. But who is it?
metadata.Writer: Gil Spencer Jr., Kevin Kurgis, Joe Bolster
metadata.Actors: Julia Montgomery, James Carroll, Suzanne Barnes
